fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Earthquake: Deal a Rampage attack at a player's house. 2 uses.
- Scald: Attack and Burn someone. A Burned player has 1 lower tier of attack for 3 nights.
- Recover: Heal yourself, giving yourself 1 higher tier of defense for the night. 3 uses.
- Toxic: Poison a player. They will die at the end of the next night if they are not healed. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Defensive(?) Typing: You have Powerful defense from all attacks, except for a randomly chosen non-Pokemon role in the game that is capable of visiting others. You will know what this role is, but not the player that has this role. If this role visits you, your base defense becomes Vulnerable for the night.

fields.name: Pokemon Ability:
fields.value: - Unaware: Your attacks ignore provided defense, i.e. defense that is not in a player's innate attributes. This includes things such as the Doctor's heals (58) and the WM Trapper's traps (176).
